traits.traitDescription: Equip a certain number of Warrior skills to increase PHYS DEF and Basic Atk Dmg, also gives basic attacks fan-shaped splash dmg effect
Equip a certain number of Assassin skills to raise Crit Rate and Crit Dmg
Equip a certain number of Guardian skills to rebound all kinds of damage received back at surrounding enemies
traitMods: Rebound 120% of Dmg Received(Rebound 10% in PVP)
Rebound 240% of Dmg Received(Rebound 20% in PVP)
Rebound 480% of Dmg Received(Rebound 30% in PVP)

traits.traitDescription: Equip a certain number of Ranger skills to give Basic Atk 30% chance or active skills 100% chance to fire tracking arrows.
Equip a certain number of Summon skills to enhance stats for all summoned creatures and extend their duration 5s
traitMods: Inherit Bonus 15% HP, 20% ATK, 20% AP from character
Inherit Bonus 30% HP, 40% ATK, 40% AP from character

traits.traitDescription: Equip a certain number of Mage skills to boost MAG DMG of next active skill within 10s after casting any active skill
Equip a certain number of Shaman skills for a chance of instantly resetting the CD of each active skill cast
Equip a certain number of Seer skills to reduce CD for all active skills
Equip a certain number of Flame skills to boost Crit Dmg for all skills, and to trigger a Burn effect for 3s (deals AP-based MAG DMG) after dealing Crit Dmg to an enemy
traitMods: 40% Crit Dmg, Burning deals 40% AP as MAG DMG Per Sec
65% Crit Dmg, Burning deals 65% AP as MAG DMG Per Sec

traits.traitDescription: Equip a certain number of Frost skills for a chance to Freeze a target upon dealing damage with any skill, Freeze will deal bonus damage to the target
Equip a certain number of Arcane skills for a chance that the next active skill will be critical hit within 10s after casting any active skill
Equip a certain number of Thunder skills to increase damage dealt to Slowed and Frozen enemies
Equip a certain number of Dark skills for a chance to trigger a Lifesteal upon dealing damage
Equip a certain number of Ocean skills for a chance to get a 10s Shield (based on percentage of max HP) after each active skill cast
Equip a certain number of Earth skills to raise the character's Max HP
Equip a certain number of Nature skills to recover HP every 5s (based on max HP)
Equip a certain number of Tornado skills for a stackable boost of MOV SPD and Dodge after using a skill (The highest dodge rate attainable is only up to 90%)
Equip a certain number of Void skills to have a chance to add bonus DMG to Basic ATKs, and make the target into Void for 3s
traitMods: 10% chance to deal 63% Bonus PHY DMG and to Void
20% chance to deal 100% Bonus PHY DMG and to Void

traits.traitDescription: Equip a certain number of Evil skills to increase ATK and ATK SPD as HP decreases
traitMods: Up to 50% ATK and 120% ATK SPD boost
Up to 100% ATK and 240% ATK SPD boost

traits.traitDescription: Equip a certain number of Origin skills to lower target Armor for 3s upon dealing Basic Atk damage
Equip a certain number of Light skills, each Active skill in cooldown grants the character a stack of ATK SPD bonus
Equip a certain number of Poison skills, and when you attack poisoned enemies, they will be blinded based on the number of poison stacks they have. 20s CD.
traitMods: Add 1s Blind for each stack of poison, up to 5 stacks
Add 1.5s Blind for each stack of poison, up to 10 stacks

traits.traitDescription: Equip a certain number of Steel skills to reduce all types of DMG taken based on your PHY DEF and MAG DEF
traitMods: Reduces DMG equal to 5% of your PHY DEF and 5% of your MAG DEF
Reduces DMG equal to 10% of your PHY DEF and 10% of your MAG DEF
